_comment: FGS 26/11/19 Prueba mensajes en fichero en inglés

activate._comment: FGS 28/11/19 Mensajes en la vista para cambiar la contraseña
activate.title: Password change
activate.pwdChangeOkMsg: The password has been modified successfully
activate.pwdValidErrRequisiteMsg: The password does not meet the requirements. Must have 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, 1 special character and at least 8 characters

login.title: Login
login.errLoginEmptyMsg: Das or password must contain some information
login.wlcmLoginMsg: Hello {{das}}, you have successfully logged in!
login.deactivatedAccountMsg: Your account is deactivated. Contact support.
login.pendActivationAccountMsg: You have not activated your account. Check your email. If you cannot find the account activation email, contact support.
login.lockedAccountMsg: You have exhausted the number of attempts to access your account, contact support to give you access to it.

create.title: Create Role
create.roleRequiredErrMsg: The name of the role is mandatory

welcome._comment: FGS 28/11/19 Mensajes en la vista welcome a la que acceden todos los usuarios.
welcome.wlcmPageh4Msg: This is the application's start window, in the top menu you will find the parts of the application to which you have access.
welcome.wlcmPageh5Msg: We wish you a pleasant stay in the application.
